author: La Red Zoocial
title: Negrito cuid√≥ al barrio por a√±os: hoy, este "viejito" busca quien lo cuide a √©l | EL ESPECTADOR
text: ¬øQui√©n no conoci√≥ a un perrito guardi√°n en el barrio? Esos que no ten√≠an hogar ni familia, pero que todos saludaban. Esos que recorr√≠an las cuadras d√≠a y noche, se alimentaban con lo que los vecinos le daban y le ladraban sin parar a cualquier desconocido que se acercara. Uno de ellos es Negrito, un perro que durante nueve a√±os fue el ‚Äúperro de la cuadra‚Äù, hasta que un d√≠a amenazaron con acabar con su vida. Negrito tuvo que dejar atr√°s su vida en las calles, pero por suerte fue rescatado por Arca Luminosa, una fundaci√≥n en Bogot√° que le prometi√≥, por fin, mostrarle lo que es el calor de un hogar. Negrito pas√≥ de dormir en andenes a descansar en una cama, de las esquinas fr√≠as a los abrazos diarios, y de las sobras a un plato de comida cada d√≠a. Y aunque los a√±os se notan, sobre todo en sus canas y sus apenas cuatro dientes, sigue siendo un luchador, con la esperanza intacta de encontrar una familia que lo acompa√±e en esta √∫ltima etapa de su vida. Las cosas no han sido f√°ciles: muchas personas lo ignoran por ser criollo, negro y viejito. Pero basta un d√≠a con √©l para enamorarse de su historia y de su dulce personalidad. Lo que algunos ven como defectos, son precisamente las razones que lo hacen √∫nico. Si usted quiere ser quien le cambie la vida a Negrito, puede comunicarse con la fundaci√≥n Arca Luminosa y abrirle la puerta de su hogar a este perro que a√∫n tiene mucho amor para dar. *Este art√≠culo es informativo y se basa en datos proporcionados por las fuentes. El medio de comunicaci√≥n no participa en procesos de adopci√≥n ni se responsabiliza por acuerdos entre particulares. üêæ ¬øQuiere estar al d√≠a y conocer las √∫ltimas noticias sobre el mundo animal? Lo invitamos a verlas en La Red Zoocial. üê∂üê±

title: Nagler Foot Center Houston Offers Top-Notch Achilles Tendon
text:
Nagler Foot Center Houston Offers Top-Notch Achilles Tendon Repair & Treatment 04-23-2025 11:36 PM CET | Business, Economy, Finances, Banking & Insurance
Press release from: Getnews / PR Agency: Content Hum
Image: https://www.globalnewslines.com/uploads/2025/04/1745409312.jpg
Nagler Foot Center Houston is the best partner for helping clients with speedy Achilles tendon repair and long-term ankle and foot recovery. Contact them to get the right treatment for various types of foot conditions.
At Nagler Foot Center Houston, a team of the best specialists works together to provide patients with top-notch functional treatment options and care for speedy recovery of their foot and ankle conditions. They utilize advanced technology and equipment to alleviate pain while improving the quality of life and mobility in individuals. Patients visit this clinic from various parts of the world to get the best treatment for various ankle and foot disorders. Their skilled doctors follow the patient-centric approach while using the most trusted techniques for Achilles tendon repair in Houston [ https://foothouston.com/achilles-tendon-surgery/ ].
Speaking about their facility, a spokesperson at Nagler Foot Center Houston said, "We have a state-of-the-art facility at Nagler Foot Center Houston to offer the best peerless treatment to our patients. Anyone who needs treatment for Achilles tendon in Houston, TX, must contact our specialists. Our experienced doctors first examine and understand the condition, counsel patients, and further begin the treatment to manage various foot and ankle issues, like hammertoes, bunions, diabetic foot ulcers, heel pain, sports-related trauma, and more. With several years of experience in their field, our specialists use the latest diagnostic means for quick recovery of each condition of an individual patient, ensuring they get the best solution to their condition."
Looking for the best podiatrist in Houston [ https://www.foothouston.com/]? Trust Nagler Foot Center Houston, as they have a team of specialists who leverage cutting-edge treatment techniques, ranging from non-invasive treatment to minimally invasive surgery, to treat various types of foot and ankle conditions. This center not only provides laser therapies and shockwave therapy but also offers customized orthotics to suit different ankle and foot complications. For anyone who needs surgery, their experienced podiatrists also perform advanced procedures with the best possible results and quick recovery. If someone has low arches or flat feet, they are more likely to get affected by bunions. However, this center offers the most advanced bunion treatment in Houston, TX.
The spokesperson also mentioned, "Seeking the specialists to treat various ankle or foot conditions, like heel pain in Houston [ https://www.foothouston.com/foot-pain-houston/]? We at Nagler Foot Center Houston understand that foot and ankle pain lead to daily life challenges. So, we provide individualized treatment to relieve pain while enhancing movement. With our best possible care for the patients, our doctors make use of the latest technologies and trusted surgical skills for effective recoveries. Thanks to our surgical competence, we have handled even the most difficult situations with care and accuracy."
What makes Nagler Food Center Houston stand out is our dedication to taking care of the needs of our patients for curing Achilles tendons, hammertoes, bunions, and more in Houston. During the consultation, we focus on care, good communication, and patient-centric treatments. We also inform patients about their diseases and available treatments for proactively managing their food health. Over the years, they have built a strong trust among their patients, as they have improved the lives of many with their advanced tailored treatments. Contact their experts today to find out more in detail.
About Nagler Foot Center Houston:
Nagler Foot Center Houston was founded by Dr. Sherman Nagler, who has several years of experience working in the Greater Houston community. Renowned for the definitive management of ankle and foot issues, their specialists combine technology and their skills to treat various foot and ankle disorders. Anyone looking for a specialist for Achilles tendon repair in Houston can consult Nagler Foot Center Houston today.

author: La Regi√≥n
title: Aviso amarillo en Ourense por fuertes lluvias
text: Esta jornada de s√°bado la provincia de Ourense cambiar√° su climatolog√≠a, que si bien estos d√≠as ha estado protagonizada por las altas temperaturas, estas dar√°n paso a las tormentas. La llegada de una vaguada de la que podr√° descolgarse una DANA, aumentar√° la probabilidad de lluvias de la zona durante este fin de semana y a lo largo de toda la semana que viene. Este viernes la Aemet ya ha publicado un aviso amarillo en la zona noroeste, Mi√±o y el sur de la provincia de Ourense. Este aviso se extiende tambi√©n a la zona interior de la provincia de Pontevedra. Seg√∫n informan en el aviso, las lluvias comenzar√°n durante las primeras horas de la tarde, prolong√°ndose hasta media noche con lluvias que podr√°n alcanzar hasta los 15 litros. El s√°bado, la probabilidad de lluvia se centrar√° durante el mediod√≠a, entre las 12,00 y las 18,00 horas. Estas tormentas destacar√°n en Ourense, donde este s√°bado se podr√°n acumular m√°s de 15 litros en cuesti√≥n de una hora a causa de los intensos chubascos. La predicci√≥n de la semana Estas lluvias no solo marcar√°n este fin de semana en la provincia de Ourense, sino que a lo largo de toda esta semana, del 13 al 19, las lluvias marcar√°n el tiempo en la provincia. Estos chubascos protagonizar√°n intervalos en la provincia, sin embargo, el aviso amarillo de la Aemet estar√° activo solo este viernes, ya que por el momento no se extender√° durante la semana.

author: Agencia AFP
title: Bar√ßa femenino encarrila pase a 'semis' de Champions al golear 4-1 al Wolfsburgo
text:
Bar√ßa femenino encarrila pase a 'semis' de Champions al golear 4-1 al Wolfsburgo
El FC Barcelona, vigente doble campe√≥n de la Champions femenina, dio un paso de gigante hacia las semifinales del torneo al vencer 4-1 este mi√©rcoles al Wolfsburgo en Alemania.
Los goles de Caitlin Dijkstra en propia puerta (26), de las espa√±olas Irene Paredes (50) y Sandra Paralluelo (53) y de la suiza Sydney Joy Schertenleib (88) dejan al equipo dirigido por Pere Romeu con mucho camino recorrido de cara a la vuelta en el Estadi Johan Cruyff de la capital catalana el 27 de marzo.
A diferencia de la final de la Champions de 2023 entre los dos equipos, ganada por estrecho margen por el Barcelona (3-2), el choque de este mi√©rcoles fue de sentido √∫nico.
Ganador de tres de las cuatro √∫ltimas Champions femeninas, el Bar√ßa, que s√≥lo ha perdido uno de sus √∫ltimos 25 partidos en la m√°xima competici√≥n europea, mostr√≥ fluidez en ataque y contuvo a las locales desde el principio.
Janina Minge marc√≥ el gol al que se aferran las alemanas para exprimir sus escasas opciones de remontar la eliminatoria.
"Quer√≠amos hacer este partido, de bastante pausa con bal√≥n, para intentar atraerlas lo m√°ximo posible, para intentar atacar la espalda de su l√≠nea defensiva", explic√≥ Romeu. "Hemos hecho un partido muy completo, hemos estado muy s√≥lidas a nivel defensivo, estoy muy contento", analiz√≥ el t√©cnico cul√©.
El martes, el Real Madrid dio otro paso importante hacia semifinales al vencer en casa al Arsenal por 2-0, aunque 'merengues' y 'cul√©s' s√≥lo se ver√≠an las caras en una hipot√©tica final, el 24 de mayo en Lisboa.
Tambi√©n este mi√©rcoles, el Manchester City se impuso 2-0 al Chelsea en un duelo ingl√©s, con doblete de la neerlandesa Vivianne Miedema, una eliminatoria de la que podr√≠a salir el rival del Barcelona en unas eventuales semifinales.
La colombiana del Chelsea Mayra Ram√≠rez vio c√≥mo le era anulado un gol por fuera de juego.

author: archyworldyscom
title: Paraguayan Tennis Players Advance in International Tournament in Chile - Archyworldys
text:
Kindness Asuncion, IP Agency.- Several compatriots remain stuck in the different categories of the tournament at the Stade Francais in Santiago, Chile, validated by the ITF at 18 years of age and by COSAT in the 16 and 14 categories.
The main figure is undoubtedly Victoria L√≥pez Ocampos, who, in the 18-player group, is in the singles quarterfinals and with her sister Ana in the doubles semi-finals.
In the round of 16, Victoria L√≥pez defeated local Samantha √Ålvarez 6-2, 6-3 and will face France‚Äôs Alice Chatiliez in the quarterfinals this Thursday for a spot in the semifinals. Sisters Ana and Victoria advanced to the semifinals of the ITF 18 after beating Peruvians Renata Rossell and Mia Zorrilla 6-1, 7-5.
In the COSAT category, Delfina Pereira defeated Argentina‚Äôs Ana Clara Bonavita 6-3 6-3 and will then face Brazil‚Äôs Martina Toniasso Mattos. Facundo Moreira, also still in the running, will face Chile‚Äôs Agust√≠n Jarabran in the quarterfinals. Likewise, in the doubles Facundo and Tom√°s Moreira, as well as Delfina Pereira together with Peru‚Äôs Triana Tocon Garc√≠a.
On the other hand, the national team‚Äôs number 1 tennis player, Adolfo Daniel Vallejo √Ålvarez, eliminated prematurely in his first appearances in singles and doubles in Manacor, continues to train at the Rafa Nadal Open venue until tomorrow, Friday, when he will travel to Cassis, the spa town on the French blue coast where he will play another Challenger 75, for which he will have to play the qualifications.La Tribuna.

title: Alerta en el Magdalena Medio santandereano por crecientes
text:
Bucaramanga
En las √∫ltimas horas en Cimitarra, Santander, reportaron una creciente el r√≠o Guayabito debido a las lluvias registradas recientemente. Hecho que puso en alerta incluso a la Gobernaci√≥n departamental.
Por primera vez Santander exportar√° carne a China
Sin embargo la Oficina de Gesti√≥n del Riesgo de Santander confirm√≥ que no gener√≥ afectaciones a la poblaci√≥n. A√∫n as√≠ es una situaci√≥n que enciende las alarmas pues el director regional, Eduard S√°nchez, confirm√≥ que en otras regiones del departamento tambi√©n se evidencia el mismo comportamiento en los r√≠os.
#Santander | Hay alerta en #Cimitarra por el aumento el caudal del r√≠o Guayabito. @GobdeSantander pidi√≥ activar planes de contigencia y evacuar a la poblaci√≥n aleda√±a. pic.twitter.com/PVYHTLi1EH
‚Äî Caracol Bucaramanga (@CaracolBga) March 21, 2024 ‚ÄúEn algunas partes como en el Magdalena Medio se han presentado crecientes que hasta el momento no han dejado consecuencias pero s√≠ ya nos pone en alerta‚Äù.
Esto sin duda es la clara evidencia del cambio del Fen√≥meno del Ni√±o a La Ni√±a, ‚Äúlas lluvias que se est√°n dando son el tr√°nsito de salir de la temporada de sequ√≠a y encontrarnos con la √©poca de lluvias , y los efectos causados por el Fen√≥meno de La Ni√±a‚Äù, agreg√≥ S√°nchez.
Contribuyentes en Bucaramanga le deben a la DIAN m√°s de 39 mil millones de pesos
Mencion√≥ la importancia de que las poblaciones ribere√±as est√©n en alerta, y evacuen cuando sea necesario. Se activaron los planes de contingencia debido a que ‚Äútendremos afectaciones en estas √©pocas de lluvia ‚Äù, afirm√≥ el jefe de la oficina de Gesti√≥n del Riesgo de Santander.
Ya el Ideam explic√≥ que hay lluvias moment√°neas en varias regiones del pa√≠s, entre ellas Santander.
‚ÄúLas afirmaciones de Iv√°n Mordisco tienen preocupados a muchos en Colombia‚Äù: Iv√°n Name
‚ÄúLluvias de variada intensidad con actividad el√©ctrica se prev√© hacia el √°rea Andina, Pac√≠fica y sur del Caribe. Especialmente sobre Choc√≥, Valle del Cauca, Cauca, Santander, Antioquia, y en sectores de Cundinamarca, Tolima y Boyac√°. Como tambi√©n el piedemonte amaz√≥nico‚Äù.
Lluvias de variada intensidad con actividad el√©ctrica, es prev√© hacia √°reas de la Andina, Pacifica y sur de la Caribe, especialmente, sobre Choc√≥, Valle del Cauca, Cauca, Santander, Antioquia, y en sectores de Cundinamarca, Tolima y Boyac√°, como tambi√©n, el piedemonte amaz√≥nico. pic.twitter.com/dOsmPSPkfg

author: ConnorAshford
title: Athletics place Mason Miller on IL, activate Ross Stripling - Athletics Nation
text: Oakland is reportedly set to lose its All-Star closer to the IL as the team announced that Mason Miller has a broken pinkie and will head to the shelf: We have made the following roster moves.‚Äî Oakland A's (@Athletics) [pic.twitter.com/mRaSBJUrhB] [July 25, 2024] Wow. What a frustrating turn of events. Miller has been nearly unhittable all season in his first action as a full-time reliever. On the year he‚Äôs sporting a pristine 2.21 ERA in 34 appearances. He‚Äôs 15-for-17 in save opportunities and has struck out an insane 70 batters in 40 2‚ÅÑ3 innings pitched. This will definitely hurt the bullpen while he‚Äôs out, but it seems like it could be a short-term injury. He‚Äôs arguably been the most electric closer in baseball with his triple-digit fastball striking fear into hitters. That‚Äôs why teams have been calling the A‚Äôs about his availability. To this point the club has repeatedly stated publicly that they‚Äôre not interested in dealing him. There have been other reports and rumors that the club is at least listening and even setting a price, a high price, on their prized reliever. Understandably so, as Miller still has five more years of team control after this season and has the added upside of possibly moving to a starting role again. This injury probably makes a trade even less likely that it already was. While this particular injury isn‚Äôt a serious one, it was just last season that Miller had a scare with his elbow. Thankfully it was a best-case scenario and he seems to have fully recovered from it but it also gave teams pause when considering whether to offer up the massive package it would take to acquire him. Never say never but it seems that Miller is here to stay, at least for now. Taking his place on the active roster is veteran right-hander Ross Stripling. The 34-year old has missed the past two months after battling elbow problems but now returns to make tonight‚Äôs start to kick off the Angels series. It‚Äôs been a tough go of it for Stripling this year as he had an unsightly 5.82 ERA before going down with injury. Hopefully the time off allowed him to figure out what was going wrong, and he‚Äôll return to the team looking more like the Stripling from the past. One can only hope.
